sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A declaration of the King, concerning the obseruation of his edicts of the vnion of his Catholique subiects, to the rooting out of heresie: carrying withall, a putting vp, and burying of all such things as haue beene cmmitted contrarie therevnto, vntill this present, by any of his saide Catholique subiects. France. Sovereign (1574-1589 : Henry III)
7, [1] p.
By S. Milanges [i.e. T. Orwin], ordinarie printer vnto the King, At Burdeaux [i.e. London] : 1589.
Imprint false; actual printer's name and place of publication from STC. Translated from the original French. Formerly STC 13094. Identified as STC 13094 on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
A declaration of the King, concerning the obseruation of his edicts of the vnion of his Catholique subiects, to the rooting out of heresie: carrying withall, a putting vp, and burying of all such things as haue beene cmmitted contrarie therevnto, vntill this present, by any of his saide Catholique subiects. France. Sovereign (1574-1589 : Henry III)
7, [1] p.
By S. Milanges [i.e. T. Orwin], ordinarie printer vnto the King, At Burdeaux [i.e. London] : 1589.
Imprint false; actual printer's name and place of publication from STC. Translated from the original French. Formerly STC 13094. Identified as STC 13094 on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
